column5: hey folks, well im just wondering if anyone from sault ste. marie has heard if the salmon are running yet? cause i am bored out of my mind and really need to get some real fishing done! the little bass just arent cutting it. lol.   JP
yup....been here for a few weeks..... Bens derby is next weekend.....  TDunn
huh, well then... what you been usin?
well i was out fishing all around the locks today and saw nothing but a freshwater drum. well.... i saw a dead steelhead and a salmon that was still very silver with nice spots.
I'm hearing its pretty slow for Kings
its slow for all of the salmon really...... there should be alot more than the odd one here and there. i didnt even catch an 'eye today..... but i lost all my crappy jigs, lol.
